author: Byron Tau
title: Midterm Elections Remain Vulnerable to Russian Meddling, U.S. Spy Chief Says
text:
WASHINGTON—The November midterm elections are vulnerable to the Russian interference that plagued the 2016 presidential election, the Trump administration’s top intelligence official said Tuesday.
Director of National Intelligence Dan Coats warned the Senate Intelligence Committee that Moscow could undertake cyber-influence operations in the coming congressional elections similar to those it stands of accused of running in 2016.
“Foreign...
